name: Marguerite 5-Piece L-Shaped White Performance Fabric Sectional Sofa
details: Perfectly proportioned in scale, sectional sofa has a slim frame with quality apparent throughout. Kiln-dried wooden frame is hand-crafted in the United States and certified sustainable by the Forest Stewardship Council ® (FSC). Thick foam-core cushions are generously filled with a feather blend for exceptional comfort. The piece is upholstered in an easy-to-clean Crypton® performance fabric that feels like a plush chenille with a hint of linen, giving it a soft texture designed to withstand plenty of wear while retaining its casually elegant feel. CB2 exclusive.
